comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Gaston M. Strobino (1891-1968) was a Swiss-born American athlete. He won the bronze medal in the marathon event at the 1912 Olympics. Sports Reference page.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
whyaduck:

Thanks for the information! We'll expand the descriptive data about Mr. Strobino and reload it to Flickr.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: He was living in Paterson, New Jersey in 1918 when he registered for the World War I draft: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/3045747933/] en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaston_M._Strobino [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/4151878237/]
